head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths DOYLE, SR. MARY LAURA

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths DOYLE, SR. MARY LAURA

block.p: DOYLE-Sr. Mary Laura. Beloved member of the Sisters of Charity on March 1, 1998. Survived by nieces, grand-nieces and grandnephews. Reposing at the Convent of Mary the Queen, 35 Vark St., Yonkers, NY, on Tuesday, 1-8 PM. Mass of Christian Burial Wednesday, 9:30 AM, at the Convent. Interment at St. Joseph's Cemetery, Yonkers. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to the Sisters of Charity Development Fund, 6301 Riverdale Ave., Bronx, NY 10471.

DOYLE-Sr. Mary Laura. Beloved member of the Sisters of Charity on March 1, 1998. Survived by nieces, grand-nieces and grandnephews. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to the Sisters of Charity Development Fund, 6301 Riverdale Ave., Bronx, NY 10471.
